channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: TikTokが初のグローバル音楽ライブイベントを発表、12月10日にアリゾナ州メサで開催、ヘッドライナーはカーディ・B、ナイアル・ホーラン、アニタ、チャーリー・プース（Rania Aniftos/Billboard）
item.description:
Rania Aniftos / Billboard:
TikTok announces its first live global music event, set for December 10 in Mesa, Arizona, with Cardi B, Niall Horan, Anitta and Charlie Puth headlining  —  The event will take place on Dec. 10 at Sloan Park in Mesa, Ariz.  —  TikTok is continuing its foray into the music world by announcing TikTok …

item.title: TelevisaUnivision、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比11％増の13億ドル、米国売上高は同5％増の8,063万ドル、米国広告収入は3％増、無料ストリーミングサービス「Vix」のMAUは4,000万人超（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
TelevisaUnivision reports Q3 revenue up 11% YoY to $1.3B, US revenue up 5% YoY to $806.3M, US ad revenue up 3%, and its free Vix streaming service has 40M+ MAUs  —  The Spanish-language media giant, led by CEO Wade Davis, reports more than 40 million monthly active users for streamer ViX …

item.title: Slackの内部メッセージによると、NYTの編集幹部は、ガザの病院爆発に関する最初のフレーミングにヘッジがあったという一部のスタッフからの指摘を退けた（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
Internal Slack messages show senior NYT editors dismissed suggestions from some staff that the paper hedge in its initial framing of the Gaza hospital explosion  —  Internal messages obtained by Vanity Fair offer a glimpse into the newsroom decision-making process and reveal pushback among …

item.title: スコラスティック社、米国の学校フェアで人種と性別をテーマにした本を分ける計画を取り下げ、本を分けることは検閲を可能にするという批判を受けた（Shruti Rajkumar/HuffPost）
item.description:
Shruti Rajkumar / HuffPost:
Scholastic drops plans to separate books based on themes about race and gender at US school fairs, after criticism that segregating books enabled censorship  —  The publisher had said it would segregate books with themes on race and gender at school fairs in order to navigate a rash of bans across the country.

item.title: 調査結果：米国の成人は、ニュースを常に、あるいはほとんど追っていると答えたが、2016年の51％から2022年には38％に減少、2022年には19％がニュースを時々追っていると答えた（Naomi Forman-Katz/Pew Research Center）
item.description:
Naomi Forman-Katz / Pew Research Center:
Survey: US adults who say they follow the news all or most of the time fell from 51% in 2016 to 38% in 2022; in 2022, 19% said they follow the news now and then  —  Americans are following the news less closely than they were a few years ago, according to a new Pew Research Center analysis.

item.title: AIがソーシャルメディアと言論の自由に与える影響、著作権問題、TikTokなどについて、ハーバード大学教授でクリエイティブ・コモンズの共同創設者であるローレンス・レッシグとのQ&A（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
Q&A with Harvard professor and Creative Commons co-founder Lawrence Lessig on AI's impact on social media and free speech, copyright issues, TikTok, and more  —  After 30 years teaching law, the internet policy legend is as worried as you'd think about AI and TikTok …

item.title: イスラエル・ハマス戦争とウクライナ戦争は、ネット上で生々しい動画を煽り、時にはプロパガンダとして世界中の視聴者に届き、より多くのトラウマを引き起こす可能性がある（Drew Harwell/Washington Post）
item.description:
Drew Harwell / Washington Post:
The Israel-Hamas and Ukraine wars are fueling graphic videos online, reaching a global audience, sometimes as propaganda, and potentially causing more trauma  —  The Israel-Gaza and Ukraine wars have flooded the web with grisly content.  One researcher says, 'It's like there are suddenly …

item.title: 5月にローンチしたメッセンジャーは、VCの寵児から不毛の殻に至るまで、VCが資金を提供し、広告に依存するメディア・スタートアップのあらゆる段階を疾走しているように見える（Lauren Theisen/Defector）
item.description:
Lauren Theisen / Defector:
The Messenger, which launched in May, appears to be speedrunning every stage of a VC-funded, ad-dependent media startup life, from VC darling to barren husk  —  Nobody can be surprised that The Messenger isn't living up to its grand promises.  Before the news site launched …

item.title: スナップ、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比5%増の$11.91億ドル（予想：$11.10億ドル）、純損失は前年同期比2%増の$3.68億ドル、DAUは前年同期比12%増の4.06万人（予想：4.057万人）、第4四半期のガイダンスは発表せず（Jonathan Vanian/CNBC
item.description:
Jonathan Vanian / CNBC:
Snap reports Q3 revenue up 5% YoY to $1.19B, vs. $1.11B est., net loss up 2% YoY to $368M, DAUs up 12% YoY to 406M, vs. 405.7M est., and won't give Q4 guidance  —  - As part of Snap's “internal forecast,” the company said that it expects sales in its fourth quarter to fall in the range …

item.title: YouTubeの第3四半期広告収入は前年同期比12.5％増の79.5億ドル、予想78.1億ドルに対し、2022年第3四半期は1.9％減で予想を下回る（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube Q3 ad revenue rose 12.5% YoY to $7.95B, vs. $7.81B est.; in Q3 2022, YouTube's ad revenue fell short of expectations after falling 1.9%  —  Internet video giant YouTube larded its coffers with $7.95 billion in ad revenue for third quarter of 2023, representing a 12.5% year-over-year increase …

item.title: ローリング・ストーン』誌の元従業員女性12人が、ジャン・ウェナーのオフィス文化について「独裁的」で「恐怖が感じられる」、「女性にとって恐ろしい場所」と語っている（Marisa Kabas/The Handbasket）。
item.description:
Marisa Kabas / The Handbasket:
A dozen female former Rolling Stone employees describe Jann Wenner's office culture as “a dictatorship” with “palpable fear” and “a horrible place for women”  —  “The men were very angry all the time, and some of them would have full on fits—like, full-on toddler-like tantrums."

item.title: 情報筋Appleは12月頃にtvOSをアップデートし、再設計されたTVアプリを提供する計画であり、より多くのユーザーをTVアプリに誘導するためにApple TVアプリの一部を廃止する計画である（Mark Gurman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Mark Gurman / Bloomberg:
Sources: Apple plans to update tvOS with a redesigned TV app around December and discontinue some of its Apple TV apps to steer more users toward the TV app  —  - Company envisions one place for customers to find video  — Dedicated apps for buying movies and shows will be phased out

item.title: Canadian Association of Broadcasters（カナダ放送協会）は、Apple NewsのようなGoogleやMeta以外のサービスもオンラインニュース法で規制するよう政府に要請している（Anja Karadeglija/National Post）。
item.description:
Anja Karadeglija / National Post:
The Canadian Association of Broadcasters urges the government to also regulate services beyond Google's and Meta's, like Apple News, under the Online News Act  —  The association said only Google and Meta are covered by the Online News Act, ‘even though there are other platforms that benefit from the distribution of news content’

item.title: ガザの病院爆発に関する報道について質問されたWSJはコメントを拒否、APとアルジャジーラは問い合わせを無視、ロイターとCNNは非を認めない（CNN）。
item.description:
CNN:
Asked about their coverage of the hospital blast in Gaza, the WSJ declines to comment, the AP and Al Jazeera ignore inquiries, Reuters and CNN admit no fault  —  Most news organizations seem eager to sweep last week's negligent coverage of the Gaza hospital explosion under the rug …

item.title: Crunchyroll、米国でAmazonのPrime Videoチャンネルで月額7.99ドル以上のストリーミングサービスを開始、今週カナダ、スウェーデン、英国でも開始（Chris Welch/The Verge）
item.description:
Chris Welch / The Verge:
Crunchyroll launches its streaming service on Amazon's Prime Video Channels in the US for $7.99+ per month, and coming to Canada, Sweden, and the UK this week  —  If you're a Prime Video subscriber, beginning today, you can start streaming Crunchyroll, the popular anime service, right from inside the Prime Video app.
